title: WTB: Zeenut Book By Jim Horne

posts.post_title: WTB: Zeenut Book By Jim Horne
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase the Zeenut book by Jim Horne
"Zeenuts  1911-1938".
Does anyone have one to sell ??
thanks
Dan
I know Jim Manos out of Ohio had copies he used to sell pretty cheap, you might reach out to him and see if he still has any.  He is on the forum sometimes if you search for him.
